class Wiring

Interface

Public Members

ShiftRight(Wire& X, Wire& Y, int by)

RotRight(Wire& X, Wire& Y, int by)

Description

fix wiring functions: shift, rotate, vector constants, etc. usage: W.AliasVector(...);

class Rect

Interface
